name: LinkplayIRController
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Linkplay IR Controller will offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience with Alexa.

Control your devices hands free. 
Just say it, Linkplay IR Controller will obey. 

Here's a step by step guide:
(1). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Linkplay IR Controller";
(2). Click Enable skill of "Linkplay IR Controller", then input your Linkplay account username, password on the Account Linking page. You can register the account on Account Linking page or companion app;
(3). Talk to Echo “Alexa, discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(4). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

For Example:

* Alexa, turn on bathroom light
* Alexa, turn off bathroom light
* Alexa, dim bathroom light
* Alexa, brighten bathroom light
* Alexa, set bathroom light to 20 percent
